name: Icarus (itch) (Victor Durel)
description:
Daedalus and his son Icarus have to get away from the Labyrinth ! But will they be able to fly to safety, when the boy doesn't listen to his father's directions ?

Play as both Icarus and Daedalus as they fly away, using the wings the father made with wax and feathers ! Avoid numerous obstacles as you go through the Labyrinth, a dangerous cave, and a cloudy sky ! But be wary - Icarus will always do the exact opposite of what his father does... Good luck !

This one-button game was developped from scratch by myself in a month, as a school project. If you'd like to know more, feel free to visit my portfolio! 

https://victordurel1.wixsite.com/durelvictorportfolio
